content.raw:
All PRs merged, I retriggered CI:

The Ubuntu build is failing, I think it should be fixed with `ign-common 3.4.0`.

The Windows build failed at `ign-math6`: `D:\Jenkins\workspace\ign_sensors-pr-win\ws\ign-math\include\ignition/math/Helpers.hh(20): fatal error C1083: Cannot open include file: 'chrono': No such file or directory [D:\Jenkins\workspace\ign_sensors-pr-win\ws\build\ignition-math6\src\ignition-math6.vcxproj]`

Hombrew is still running.
content.html:
All PRs merged, I retriggered CI:

The Ubuntu build is failing, I think it should be fixed with ign-common 3.4.0.

The Windows build failed at ign-math6: D:\Jenkins\workspace\ign_sensors-pr-win\ws\ign-math\include\ignition/math/Helpers.hh(20): fatal error C1083: Cannot open include file: 'chrono': No such file or directory [D:\Jenkins\workspace\ign_sensors-pr-win\ws\build\ignition-math6\src\ignition-math6.vcxproj]

Hombrew is still running.
